text: Ivomoku Bakusuba was a Burundian serial killer who confessed to having killed over 67 children. ==Crimes and arrest== Bakusuba killed his victims by strangling them with a bedsheet. He targeted mostly poor girls and boys, as he was a poor man himself. In the 1940s, Kayanza Province inhabitants were panicked by Bakusuba. He was arrested in 1944, and confessed to killing 67 children. ==Death== He committed suicide, "probably in the late 1940s or early 1950s". == References == Category:1940s deaths Category:1950s deaths Category:Male suicides Category:Male serial killers Category:Burundian criminals Category:Burundian serial killers
